function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","Impact":"High risk of increased disease transmission and outbreaks if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Implement strict control measures during high community transmission periods","Technologies":"PCR testing, syndromic surveillance, contact tracing","People":"Community members, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, local government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of publication bias leading to inaccurate assessment of intervention effectiveness","Impact":"Misleading conclusions about intervention effectiveness and safety","Mitigation":"Implement transparent publication practices, use multiple bias assessment tools","Technologies":"Publication bias assessment tools","People":"Researchers, journal editors","Owner":"Research institutions, journal publishers"},{"Description":"Potential risk of low-quality studies influencing meta-analysis results","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of intervention effectiveness and safety","Mitigation":"Implement sensitivity analysis, exclude low-quality studies, use standardized quality assessment tools","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, quality assessment tools","People":"Researchers, reviewers, study authors","Owner":"Research institutions, reviewers, journal publishers"}]}
